page.title: 18THE HISTORY OF THE SCHOOL
page.content: The Bradwell school is built where it is because it is in the middle of everywhere.The school opened in 1979 at that time there were 29 children.It started of as a combined school ages from 5 to 12.In September 1981 there were 271 children.1982 there were 464 children.In 1983 there were 578 children.September 1984 there were 564 children July 1984 there were 598 children.1984 it turned into a middle school with 380 children.1985 there were 411 children.There are two playgrounds designed because there would be to many children in one.The reason why we have a conservation area is because some animals are in danger of becoming exstinct.The Headmaster of the school thought the domesday project was a good idea and seem to be organized well.
